authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt John R. Sweney

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
O there's sunshine,
blessed sunshine,
when the peaceful happy moments roll.

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
When Jesus shows
His smiling face,

there is sunshine
in my soul.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
There is sunshine
in my soul today,
more glorious and bright

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Than glows
in any earthly sky,
for Jesus is my light.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
There is music
in my soul today,
a carol to my King;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And Jesus,
listening can hear
the songs I cannot sing.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
There is springtime
in my soul today,
for when the Lord is near

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
The dove of peace
sings in my heart,

the flow'rs
of grace appear.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
There is gladness
in my soul today,

and hope
and praise
and love,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
For blessings
which He gives me now,
for joys "laid up" above.
